title.rendered: Large Scale Commercial Painting and Decorating Services

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1629209247624{padding-top: 4% !important;padding-bottom: 4% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/banner-LargeS-1.jpg?id=9954) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”hidden-desktop”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1629209251609{margin-top: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(216,216,216,0.66) !important;*background-color: rgb(216,216,216) !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Large Scale Commercial Painting and Decorating in London

[/vc_column_text]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1628847335912{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/banner-LargeS.jpg?id=9439) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”hidden-phone”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628847347679{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 500px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner el_class=”page-container”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1628847363937{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

Large Scale Commercial Painting and Decorating in London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[vc_column_text color=”#ffffff”]
  • We are a painting and decorating your large-scale commercial project all day, every day with our flexible hours and service
  • Services available as early as the next day
  • Professional painters and decorators with a minimum of 5 years experience painting and decorating
  • Health & Safety, Insurance, and Warranty – all covered
  • We guarantee a problem-free and prompt service, so your business continues to run and is completed in time
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1627898113333{margin-top: 80px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”100% 95%”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1627897408163{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9442″ img_size=”348×518″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1575911545013{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Transforming Large scale commercial Projects within any time specification

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text color=”#404040″]

Our team has extensive experience with large scale commercial projects across London. With our flexible hours and schedule, we will work on your business around your requirements, acknowledging the public and the environment. The Good Painter guarantees excellent service as your business, and the well-being is our priority.

[/vc_column_text]
See Our Company Brochure
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627897703647{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552405503107{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

Large Scale Commercial Painting and Decorating Services

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ font_size=”d:27|pp:23″ text_align=”center”]


No Commercial project is too big for us to manage and handle, our professional painters and decorators will supply a quality result to your space!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1627898102094{margin-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9444″ img_size=”652×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Retail Stores

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

As a business, we understand how important it is to have the most elegant image and display of your brand and company.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9445″ img_size=”652×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Offices

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

Transforming larger offices to create the most comfortable and inspirational environment for your workers every day.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9446″ img_size=”652×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Hospitality

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

Whatever your design and ideas, our painters and decorators can supply quality materials to renovate your commercial space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627899008199{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552509497433{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Need an experienced service for your large scale commercial project?
Our flexible hours will suit your requirements.

GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1627900432694{margin-left: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1628847463595{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” font_family=”Playfair Display” text_align=”center” font_size=”d:30|pp:25″]

Painting and decorating projects we have delivered across London

[/vc_column_text]

Painting and Decorating Large Office in High Holborn

A Sports betting Company was looking to create an exciting environment and a good representation…

Painting and Decorating a Commercial Stores Exterior

Our client Magnet is a well-known brand that helps you create your dream kitchen by…

Painting and Decorating Luxury Retail Store in Mayfair

Ralph & Russo have asked the Good Painter to renovate their five story-building Store located…

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” typography_style=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1627900425019{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1627899143866{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Why choose The Good Painter

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

London based experienced team of painters and decorators

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Flexible hours and approach

We are flexible. We work out of hours; weekends and overnight shifts painting and decorating London commercial spaces to make sure your business doesn’t stop operating and is not disturbed by decorating works.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Superb service and quick turn around

Our manager will contact you within 2 hours of enquiry, you will receive quote immediately. Your project will be completed within a short time frame. Just sit back and watch our skilled team complete the job with the speed of a skyrocket.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Fully insured and protected

We know how important it is for you to feel safe and sure, that’s why we have it all covered. We have the most extended Health and Safety, Insurances, Warranties to give you an extra piece of mind.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Experienced and reliable team

Our team can advise you on the best was to achieve your decoration goals. They know the best tools and materials to use for every application and always follow the best practices to achieve perfect results.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Our Reputation and Customer satisfaction

We are the painting company who is not happy until you are happy. This is why our team will talk you through the process and answer any questions you might have before commencing any works.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Top quality, superb attention to details

Some things are just best left to professionals. Painting and decorating requires skill and expertise and there is no room for compromise when it comes to painting and decorating of your project.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Free consultation with every project

To make sure you are perfectly happy with the result we offer a free consultation with one of our in-house experts. During the consultation we will discuss your requirements and explain you all about the process.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

We leave every job clean and tidy

We make sure perfect quality throughout, our team will cover all the furniture, surface and your belongings, removes all waste materials and thoroughly cleans and tidies the property.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627899614041{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552509497433{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Transform your business while keeping it open and safe to the public

GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627900454643{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” color=”#404040″]

Our process, explained

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ font_size=”d:20|pp:15″]

With our quick and easy five step process you will always know what’s next

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style=”flat” shape=”round” color=”white” alignment=”center” active_section=”1″ no_fill_content_area=”true”][vc_tta_section title=”Initial consultation” tab_id=”1560500045682-4aa0d86d-c553″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Our friendly, professional team gets in touch with you to discuss your project.

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]When we are talking to you, we don’t just listen to hear, we listen to we understand. We also understand that not everyone is an expert in the world of decorating, that’s why we are here after all! We work with you to arrive at the best possible solution that’s most suited to your project requirements. We have a good knowledge of the market and are confident to advise you on many subjects, from colour and material specifications to the durability and pricing of different materials. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9258″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Planning” tab_id=”1560500045757-77d922f7-6353″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

We work together with you the plan the project following your requirements

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]After establishing the exact scope of the project based on the consultation process, we prepare our detailed plans and documents for the works needed, so everything is plain and simple. We establish a timeline that works the best for you then assign and brief in a project team chosen to your specific requirements.

Finally, we purchase all the products, materials, tools and protection needed. Don’t worry, these are all covered in your package price already! [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9260″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Preparation and painting” tab_id=”1560500978174-fa48fe1c-452b”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Are you ready for the big day? We sure are!

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]Our team arrives on the site with all the required tools and materials. As long as access is organised, you don’t even need to be in if you prefer not to. We can pick up and drop off the keys from a neighbour or nearby location that’s convenient for you.

We protect all surfaces, built-in and freestanding furniture with maximum care and prepare the areas for decorating. Let’s just say, the next part is we are best known for… Painting. As experts in the field, we always work with the highest quality products and best practices to ensure consistently outstanding results.  [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9261″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Cleaning” tab_id=”1560501153491-7635ab29-1310″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

You will only know we have been there from the amazing work we left behind.

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]Once all the coats have dried and your dedicated project manager have given the final approval to the team, ensuring perfect quality throughout, our team removes all waste materials and thoroughly cleans and tidies the property. We take extra care to return everything just how we found it. We can drop the keys for you at a convenient nearby location.

For larger projects a professional cleaning company can also be provided – just ask. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9262″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Handover” tab_id=”1560501278728-2e0dfc51-630d”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

We will make sure you are 100% happy with the result

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]Our work isn’t over until you are completely satisfied. We follow up to review everything with you and discuss how to maintain the surfaces. We also issue you a detailed digital copy of your finishes schedule for future reference, so you will have it on hand the next time you need it.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9259″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627900076974{background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers say about us and
painting and decorating jobs we have completed across London

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552923219689{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_row_inner]

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1569584577928{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Our painters and decorators use superior products
and deliver excellent quality jobs across London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We guarantee a perfect result

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1569595856788{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1065″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1081″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1067″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1018″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1083″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1569584577928{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ font_size=”d:20|pp:15″]

Our painters and decorators use superior products
and deliver excellent quality jobs across London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We guarantee a perfect result

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1627900239196{background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

Get started with your painting and decorating project

GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[vc_column_text text_align=”center” color=”#ffffff” font_size=”d:24|tl:24″]We will get back to you with our competitive quotation as soon as possible, so you can get started with your project in confidence[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1627900371332{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column]
